bill.title: Relating to education.
bill.description: Requires Higher Education Coordinating Commission to conduct study to determine best method for improving employment opportunities for recent graduates of public post-secondary institutions of education. Requires Higher Education Coordinating Commission to conduct study to determine best method for improving employment opportunities for recent graduates of public post-secondary institutions of education. Directs commission to submit findings to interim committees of Legislative Assembly related to higher education not later than September 15, 2024.

history.action: Introduction and first reading. Referred to President's desk.
